item.description:
Have you ever been in that stuck place or moment where you just could not seem to shift?

What were you focused on? Was it uncertainty, loneliness, worthlessness?

These are the times when we feel our own pain and suffering, and if we stay stuck too long we quickly manifest the things we don't want.

Yet, we can always do something to change the pain, even if only in a small way, that will create changes, and we can do this in as little as FIVE MINUTES.


Creating an attitude of gratitude is one of the easiest steps we can take to improve our lives. The happiness that we create for ourselves by showing our appreciation has far-reaching effects, both for ourselves and for those we come into contact with.

I will take you through a process that will move you from feelings of despair to gratitude in just five minutes.

Join me as we discuss:

The 6 Major Human Needs

The Most Important Human Need

The Big Difference Between Pain vs Suffering

What gets us Stuck

How to Shift our Attitude in Five Minutes

Please call if you are joining us for the first time

We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.
See you there! 

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Shifting Our Attitude to Gratitude in Five Minutes
